site.title: url4irl - Technology that serves humanity
site.description: A paradigm shift from attention-harvesting applications to life-enhancing tools that strengthen real-world connections and empower individual agency.

hero.title: Technology that serves
hero.description: A paradigm shift from attention-harvesting applications to life-enhancing tools that strengthen real-world connections and empower individual agency.

philosophy.title: Core Philosophy
philosophy.description: Technology should serve humanity, not consume it. url4irl represents a paradigm shift from attention-harvesting applications to life-enhancing tools that strengthen real-world connections and empower individual agency.

screenTime.title: Screen-Time Liberation
screenTime.description: Create tools that handle mundane digital tasks efficiently, freeing people to engage with the physical world. Think smart automation that works in the background, not addictive interfaces that demand constant attention.

democratized.title: Democratized Development
democratized.description: Provide a comprehensive toolkit that makes building community-focused software accessible to everyone - from neighborhood organizers to small business owners. Pre-built, secure modules for authentication, messaging, and data management that prioritize privacy and local control.

empowered.title: Empowered Learning
empowered.description: Bridge the gap between everyday users and technology creators through educational resources that demystify modern development while emphasizing ethical, human-centered design principles.

cta.title: Ready to join the movement?
cta.description: Help us build technology that truly serves humanity and strengthens our communities.

projects.eutiveumsonho: Eu tive um sonho is a social network designed for dreamers to preserve and exchange their dreams within the worldwide dreaming community.
projects.domain-verification: Verify and instruct domain configuration, enabling you to proceed pointing to them after DNS TXT record verification
projects.token-count: A service that offers API endpoints for users to send documents and have them broken down into an AI readiness/usage analysis: token count, document size in bytes, character count, etc
projects.searxng: SearXNG is a privacy-respecting, hackable metasearch engine that aggregates results from various search engines while protecting user privacy.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Insights and thoughts on technology that serves humanity.
